Interface ReleaseAssets


  • @Immutable
public interface ReleaseAssets
    Github release assets.
    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Carlos Miranda (miranda.cma@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Releases API
